name: The Battary
description: Stores energy
effect: Babies have 2 charge bars, does not affect active items
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Steam Sale
description: Gives a 33% discount in Stores
effect: Items in stores cost 33% less
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Poke Go
description: Gives you a random monster card at the start of the level
effect: Allows the player to deploy a free charmed monster that changes every level
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Salvation
description: In critical situation eliminates the entire row, saving you a charger
effect: Creates a line of electricity in front of the player's chargers, which instantly kills an entire row of enemies when an enemy steps on it
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Schoolbag
description: Allows you to carry one more baby with you
effect: Allows the player to have 5 babies on hand instead of 4
creator: DoctorHummer

name: PHD
description: Better pills, more knowledge
effect: Makes all pills have good effects and allows the player to see the effects before using them for the first time
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Sanguine Bond
description: Installs spikes in front of your defensive babies
effect: Places a Spike Baby in front of defensive babies (Dry Baby, Cube of Meat, Tooth & Nail, etc.)
creator: DoctorHummer

name: The Black Bean
description: Newly placed babies fart, poisoning nearby enemies
effect: Newly placed babies leave a poison cloud that poisons all enemies around it
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Red Shovel
description: Take back what belongs to you
effect: Refunds half heart upon shoveling a baby
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Champion Belt
description: More waves on each floor
effect: Adds an extra wave to levels
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Little Baggy
description: Allows to carry four pills
effect: Gives the player an extra pill slot
creator: DoctorHummer

name: WindUp Key
description: Manual launch
effect: Lets you manually fire off chargers, Fistuloid and Dry Baby
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Flip
description: Right Click to turn babies around
effect: Allows the player to flip the direction a baby is facing (has a special interaction with Lil Loki)
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Stop Watch
description: Let's slow this down a bit
effect: Adds a button that slows down the game
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Eden's Blessing
description: Your future shines brighter
effect: The player will get an extra random baby and pill at the start of the next run
creator: DoctorHummer

name: The D6
description: Reroll your destiny
effect: Allows the player to reroll the baby choices after every level.
creator: DoctorHummer

description: Start with more hearts
effect: Start every level with 50 more hearts
creator: DoctorHummer

name: More Options
description: There's more options
effect: Adds an additional baby option after every level
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Spider Mod
description: Jarvis, show me their healthbars
effect: Shows the health and defense of monsters and babies
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Crystal Ball
description: Reveals the hidden options
effect: Reveals the hidden baby at the end of every level and shows the baby inside Mystery Gift
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Evil Charm
description: Shows where the monsters are coming from
effect: Places arrows on the right side of the screen pointing at offscreen monsters
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Purple Heart
description: Increases the chance of encountering champion enemies
effect: Champions have a higher spawn chance
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Dirty Mind
description: Filthy friends
effect: Destroying poops creates friendly dips on the top and bottom of the poop pile (also works with squirts)
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Frosty Mint
description: Freezes enemies biting your babies
effect: Slows monsters while they are eating babies
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Mystery Gift
description: Wrapped up nice for you
effect: Gives a random baby when opened
creator: DoctorHummer

name: The Bean
description: Baby farts when killed, pushing enemies back
effect: Babies fart on death, pushing enemies away
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Dr. Medicine
description: Allows you to replace damaged babies
effect: Placing babies on top of existing ones heals them
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Blanket
description: Babies on the closest row get a protective bubble
effect: Gives all babies on the leftmost column a shield
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Sharp Plug
description: When a baby is hit, the corresponding card gets charge
effect: Recharges the corresponding baby's bar when it is hit
creator: DoctorHummer

name: Isaac's Fork
description: Enemies killed with spikes or thorns will drop hearts
effect: Enemies defeated by Spike Baby or Tooth & Nail drop hearts
creator: DoctorHummer

name: There's Options
description: Two rewards after beating a Boss, only one can be taken
effect: Adds an additional active item choice after beating a boss
creator: DoctorHummer
